Key Match Events: Cam Whitmore and Alperen Sengun combined to score 20 points during a 23-4 run that turned a 10-point deficit into a 53-44 lead
Others: Jalen Green scored 22 points, Dillon Brooks added 19 points and six rebounds
Klay Thompson posted 16 points and four 3-pointers for the Mavericks
P.J. Washington did not return for the second half due to a right knee sprain
